keys: jogos para o inglês de aprendizagem
παιχνίδια για την εκμάθηση των αγγλικών
juegos para el inglés que aprende
resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1124</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">At School -Matching-Letter Ll</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An der Schule - Zusammenbringen-Zeichen Ll</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">À l'École - Apparier-Lettre Ll</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Na Escola - Combin-Letra Ll</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Alla Scuola - Abbin-Lettera Ll</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στο σχολείο - ταιριάζω με-επιστολή Ll</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En La Escuela - Corresponder con-Carta Ll</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Pupils will be able to recognize the following letters and their sounds; c,b,t,a,s,e,l,m 
Listen to the words and look at the pictures, match the word you hear to the picture. This activity introduces words that begin with the letter Ll.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ABC</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">english as a second language</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning english</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">interactive activities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">games for learning english</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pupillen können, die folgenden Zeichen und ihre 
Töne zu erkennen; c, b, t, a, s, e, L, m hören zu den Wörtern
und betrachten die Abbildungen, zusammenbringen das Wort, das Sie zur 
Abbildung hören. Diese Aktivität stellt Wörter vor, die mit 
dem Zeichen Ll anfangen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les pupilles pourront identifier les lettres 
suivantes et leurs bruits ; c, b, t, a, s, e, l, m écoutent les
mots et regardent les images, apparient le mot que vous entendez à 
l'image. Cette activité présente les mots qui commencent par 
la lettre Ll.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As pupilas poderão  reconhecer as seguintes 
letras e seus sons; c, b, t, a, s, e, l, m escuta as palavras e 
olha os retratos, combina a palavra que você se ouve ao retrato. 
Esta atividade introduz as palavras que começam com a letra Ll.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le pupille potranno riconoscere le seguenti 
lettere ed i loro suoni; la c, b, t, a, s, e, l, m. ascolta le 
parole e guarda le immagini, abbina la parola che vi sentite 
all'immagine. Questa attività introduce le parole che 
cominciano con la lettera Ll.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι μαθητές θα είναι σε θέση να αναγνωρίσουν τις 
ακόλουθες επιστολές και τους ήχους τους  το γ, β, τ, α, s,
ε, λ, μ ακούει τις λέξεις και εξετάζει τις εικόνες, ταιριάζει με 
τη λέξη που ακούτε στην εικόνα. Αυτή η δραστηριότητα 
εισάγει τις λέξεις που αρχίζουν με την επιστολή Ll.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las pupilas podrán reconocer las cartas 
siguientes y sus sonidos; c, b, t, a, s, e, l, m escucha las 
palabras y mira los cuadros, corresponde con la palabra que usted oye 
al cuadro. Esta actividad introduce las palabras que comienzan 
con la carta Ll.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ABC</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch als zweite Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erlernenenglisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">interaktive Aktivitäten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiele für erlernenenglisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ABC</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'anglais comme deuxième langage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'anglais d'étude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">activités interactives</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jeux pour l'anglais d'étude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ABC</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
